name: Shimmer and Shine
overview: Twins genies, Shimmer and Shine, grant their human friend Leah three wishes every day - unintentional chaos follows.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The first season takes place in the human world and focuses on a young girl named Leah, who is friends with a pair of twin genies in training named Shimmer and Shine. Leah's genies grant her three wishes every day, but they often mess up. Each episode features Leah working together with her genies to solve the problems they inadvertently cause, all while keeping Shimmer and Shine a secret from her next-door neighbor Zac.

episodes.name: My Secret Genies - Part 1
episodes.overview: Leah wins a genie bottle pendant at a carnival and is surprised to find that her prize comes with a bonus – genies Shimmer and Shine.

episodes.name: My Secret Genies - Part 2
episodes.overview: Things get more complicated when Leah uses up her remaining wishes to keep Zac from seeing the elephant, resulting in a polka-dotted elephant on roller skates and a giant bounce castle.

episodes.name: The Sweetest Thing
episodes.overview: When Leah wishes for help making cupcakes for a bake sale, she and the genies find themselves stuck with a giant birthday cake, some farm animals, and a river of cupcake batter. How will Leah finish without any wishes left?

episodes.name: Dino Might!
episodes.overview: After searching endlessly for Zac's missing dinosaur toy, Leah asks her genies to wish up a replacement and gets stuck with a real live Apatosaurus! Leah, Shimmer, and Shine have to figure out a way to fix this behemoth mistake.

episodes.name: Genie Treehouse
episodes.overview: Leah and Zac try building a treehouse but find themselves in over their heads. Leah asks her genies for a treehouse and is thrown for a loop when Shimmer and Shine turn her house into a house of trees!

episodes.name: What a Pig Mess
episodes.overview: When Leah's party food accidentally gets run over by Zac, Leah needs to figure out what else to bring fast. Leah asks her genies for more Pigs in a Blanket, but the genies give her real pigs wrapped in a blanket!

episodes.name: Ahoy, Genies!
episodes.overview: When Leah's bucket full of beach treasures floats into the vast ocean, Leah summons Shimmer and Shine to help her retrieve the loot.

episodes.name: Lights! Camera! Genies!
episodes.overview: Leah and Zac are excited to watch their favorite movie, but Leah's popcorn burns and the movie won't play. Leah asks Shimmer and Shine for some movie magic help, but they accidentally wish the movie to life!

episodes.name: Backyard Ballet
episodes.overview: While Leah and Zac are trying to re-enact their new favorite ballet, Leah makes a wish to be a ballerina like the Swan Queen.

episodes.name: Abraca-Genie
episodes.overview: Leah notices Zac the Magician's magic tricks aren't going well, so she calls on her genies for some real magic assistance. But Shimmer and Shine aren't getting the tricks right either, and the girls have a magical mess to fix!

episodes.name: Santa's Little Genies
episodes.overview: When Leah accidentally wishes Santa to a tropical island and the elves asleep, the girls must deliver presents and save Christmas.

episodes.name: Spaceship Wrecked
episodes.overview: When Leah wishes that she were able to talk to an alien, Shimmer and Shine poof one into her backyard.

episodes.name: A Very Genie Halloweenie
episodes.overview: It's Halloween, and Leah invites her genies over to join the fun. Leah makes a wish to make Zac's house look haunted, but the genies turn it into a real haunted house, with a real Frankenstein! It's a spooktacular adventure!

episodes.name: Sleep-Over Party
episodes.overview: Leah invites Shimmer and Shine over for their very sleepover party, but the genies' wish granting turns it into a dance party ... and the girls can't stop dancing!

episodes.name: Game On
episodes.overview: Leah and Zac save up for months to get the big prize at the arcade, but the ticket counting machine malfunctions.

episodes.name: Gone Bowlin'
episodes.overview: Leah is having a tough time trying to knock down a single bowling pin, so she calls on Shimmer and Shine to lend a little genie magic to improve her game.

episodes.name: The Great Skate Mistake
episodes.overview: The Great Skate Mistake - Leah's skateboard breaks while practicing for the big skateboard competition, so she asks Shimmer and Shine for a new board.

episodes.name: Dream Dollhouse
episodes.overview: Leah wishes for more doll friends for her genies to play with in her new dollhouse so the genies shrink themselves down.

episodes.name: Escape Goat
episodes.overview: An escaped goat provides an adventure when Leah, Shimmer, and Shine try to corral him.

episodes.name: Happy Wishaversary
episodes.overview: Leah receives a magical bracelet from the twins as a present, but then Rocket grabs the enchanted bangle and begins to float.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: The first season takes place in the human world and focuses on a young girl named Leah, who is friends with a pair of twin genies in training named Shimmer and Shine. Leah's genies grant her three wishes every day, but they often mess up. Each episode features Leah working together with her genies to solve the problems they inadvertently cause, all while keeping Shimmer and Shine a secret from her next-door neighbor Zac.

episodes.name: Welcome to Zahramay Falls
episodes.overview: Shimmer and Shine are so thrilled to receive the Green Burst Gem from Princess Samira that when they visit Leah, they take the gem along to show it to her.

episodes.name: All Bottled Up
episodes.overview: Shimmer and Shine open a super sparkly bottle at the market... and get sucked into it!

episodes.name: Zoom Zahramay
episodes.overview: It's a trap, set by Zeta. And since they're stuck inside, they can't grant wishes!

episodes.name: A Tree-mendous Rescue
episodes.overview: Shimmer, Shine, and their genie-friend, Kaz, are given a mission to find a brand-new gem deep within Genie Forest.

episodes.name: Flying Flour
episodes.overview: Shimmer, Shine, and Leah plan to bake a super fun treat: flying cookies!

episodes.name: Mermaid Mayhem
episodes.overview: When Shimmer and Shine tell Leah that mermaids live in Zahramay Falls, Leah wishes that they could be mermaids too.

episodes.name: Snow Place We'd Rather Be
episodes.overview: Princess Samira sends Leah and the genies to find a snowflake gem hidden inside an ice palace.

episodes.name: Starry Night Sleepover
episodes.overview: Shimmer, Shine and Leah must retrieve their stolen wishing star from Zeta before she makes a wish.

episodes.name: Wild Carpet Chase
episodes.overview: Zeta manages to get her hands on Zac's new carpet.

episodes.name: Lost and Found
episodes.overview: When Zeta accidentally transports Tala to her lair, the girls set out to rescue her.

episodes.name: Freeze-amay Falls
episodes.overview: The girls must help an ice genie when Zeta steals her ice gem necklace.

episodes.name: Bling, Bling
episodes.overview: Princess Samira asks Leah and her genies to take her special necklace to the Genie Jeweler to be polished. When Zeta steals Samira's necklace, the gang must retrieve it before Zeta figures out its special power.

episodes.name: Staffinated
episodes.overview: Zeta steals Princess Samira's magic staff and uses it to turn a tree into giant chicken which she uses to cause trouble in Zahramay Falls.

episodes.name: Dragon Pox
episodes.overview: Leah and her genies encounter Zeta's dragon Nazboo while shopping for Nahal and Tala at a local pet shop when she suddenly becomes ill and inform Zeta that she has Dragon Pox by Shine. Despite normally being enemies with Zeta, Leah and the genies want to help cure Nazboo. Leah suggests using "wish magic" but Zeta and the genies reveal that using wishing magic on a dragon like Nazboo is dangerous, as it usually backfires. It is revealed that the only known cure for Dragon Pox is Dragon Peppers, which Leah and her genies offer to retrieve while Zeta takes care the sick Nazboo

episodes.name: Lightning in a Bottle
episodes.overview: Leah and her genies meet a Lightning Genie in training named Shaya while she is chasing after a runaway magic lightning bolt she created and end up teaching her a lesson in teamwork.

episodes.name: Size of the Beholder
episodes.overview: Zeta uses a genie gem to shrink Zahramay Falls Marketplace, which she places under a Crystal Dome that is immune to wishing magic. When Shine and Leah get trapped under the dome, its up to Shimmer and Tala to get the gem from Zeta in order to restore Zahramay Falls to its proper size, without the use of wishing magic.

episodes.name: Zoomicorn Toss
episodes.overview: The genies, Leah, Zac, their genies, Shaya and Zeta compete in the Zoomicorn Toss Tournament, where the use of magic is not allowed. However Zeta is determined to win the tournament trophy even if it means breaking the rules.

episodes.name: Double Trouble
episodes.overview: Leah and the genies discover a genie gem that can duplicate people and are forced to contend with an entire army of Zetas when the sorceress manages to steal it.

episodes.name: Zany Ziffilon
episodes.overview: While hanging out with Leah and her genies, Zac asks Kaz if she wanted to have a pet like Shimmer and Shine do, she reveals her dream pet would be a griffin-like creature called a Ziffilon, causing Zac to wish for a pet Ziffilon for Kaz.

episodes.name: Volcano Drain-o
episodes.overview: When Zeta and Nazboo suck all the glitter out of the glitter volcano, Mount Navine in order for Zeta to use the glitter to make her potions more powerful, Leah and her genies must stop her.

episodes.name: Cleanie Genies
episodes.overview: In order to clean up her lair, Zeta steals Shimmer's Pristine Gem, enchanting cleaning supplies.

episodes.name: Now You See Her
episodes.overview: Leah makes friends with a fox that can turn invisible.

episodes.name: Untamed Talent
episodes.overview: Leah, her genies, and Zeta enter their respective pets into the Zahramay Falls Pet Talent Show. When Leah's pet Parisa manages to impress with his talent for painting, Zeta decides to cheat using her magic to ensure Nazboo wins the competition, so she can have her wish for a genie gem that will make her all-powerful.

episodes.name: The Crystal Queen
episodes.overview: Zeta captures Samira and seals her inside Caliana Caves which contain crystals that are invulnerable to wishing magic. Leah and her genies are forced to seek help from Samira's mentor, Empress Caliana to free Samira who is trapped in a crystal atop the head of the cave's crystalline Guardian, Rohan who has fallen under the effects of Zeta's magic. Caliana and the girls must find a way to free Rohan from Zeta's spell to save Samira. Meanwhile, an angry Roya confronts Zeta and Nazboo when they try to takeover Samira's place

episodes.name: The Glob
episodes.overview: The girls accidentally create a friendly, sticky glob of Gooey Gummy Genie Jelly candy who is curious about everything. Suddenly, when a storm called a Glitternado hits Zahramay Falls, he helps Leah and her genies rescue some genies that had gotten pulled into the storm.

episodes.name: Pet Bedroom
episodes.overview: Leah babysits the rambunctious pets as Shimmer and Shine secretly build them new, fun bedrooms.

episodes.name: Boom Zahra-Mom
episodes.overview: When a baby bird mistakes Zeta for its mom, the girls must help her return it to its nest.

episodes.name: Frosty Fun
episodes.overview: Little ice sprites use Shimmer and Shine's palace for their games, turning it into a winter wonderland.

episodes.name: Zeta in Training
episodes.overview: Samira offers Zeta the chance to be a genie again under one condition: she must grant Shimmer and Shine’s wishes.

episodes.name: Masquerade Charade
episodes.overview: Leah, Shimmer, and Shine attend a party at Samira's palace. Zeta crashes the party pretending to be Samira

episodes.name: The Silent Treatment
episodes.overview: Zeta uses a potion to swap Leah's voice with a bird's. Will Shimmer and Shine understand Leah's tweets?

episodes.name: Potion Control
episodes.overview: When the girls accidentally mixes with the wrong potion, it causes Nazboo to float up in the air and need to reverse the potion.

episodes.name: Feel Better
episodes.overview: A sneezing bug buzzes through Zahramay Falls, causing all the genies to create hilarious magic when they sneeze.

episodes.name: The Pirate Genie
episodes.overview: The girls are in for some fun and adventure when a pirate genie accidentally lands on their doorstep.

episodes.name: Trick or Treasure
episodes.overview: The girls visit Nila the mermaid for an underwater treasure hunt.

episodes.name: Easy As Pie
episodes.overview: Zeta uses a potion to make Zac do everything she says. Can Kaz and the girls stop Zeta before it's too late?

episodes.name: Bungle in the Jungle
episodes.overview: Zeta traps the girls in an ancient temple, where they must work together to escape

episodes.name: The Mysterious Tower
episodes.overview: Zac, Kaz and the girls explore a mysterious tower and find a necklace capable of transforming individuals into monsters.

episodes.name: Underground Bound
episodes.overview: As the girls search for Leah's lost necklace, an underground creature finds it and begins making wishes with it

episodes.name: Wishy Washy Genie
episodes.overview: After Zac wishes to stay in Zahramay Falls forever, the children search for a powerful genie to reverse the wish.

episodes.name: Carpet Troubles
episodes.overview: The girls visit the carpet vendor to fix their carpet, while Zeta and Nazboo plan to take some magic thread.

episodes.name: Dragon Tales
episodes.overview: Zeta and Nazboo tell the girls the fun story of how they first met, but their facts do not quite match up.

episodes.name: Rainbow Zahramay
episodes.overview: When the magical rainbow water goes out of balance, Samira sends the girls through the waterfall to a new world – Rainbow Zahramay. There, they meet a Waterfall Genie who can help them bring balance to the water.

episodes.name: Hairdos and Don't's
episodes.overview: The girls meet a genie with the power to change hairstyles, but Zeta’s determined to take the power for herself.

episodes.name: Flower Power
episodes.overview: The girls travel to a magic garden, where they meet a Flitter Genie and shrink down to her size to explore.

episodes.name: Samira and Zeta
episodes.overview: Samira tells the girls the story of how she and Zeta first met, and how they were once best friends.

episodes.name: The Zeta Touch
episodes.overview: The girls must stop Zeta when she takes a scepter that gives her the power to grow magical vines and gems.

episodes.name: Genie for a Day
episodes.overview: When Leah wishes to be a genie for the day, Zeta uses magic to have Leah grant her wishes.

episodes.name: Zac the Clueless Detective
episodes.overview: When Zac thinks the girls are missing, he plays detective and goes on the search with Kaz.

episodes.name: Abracanope
episodes.overview: The girls befriend a cute creature, only to find out that their magic doesn't work when it's nearby.

episodes.name: Treehouse Retreat
episodes.overview: Zeta's relaxing night at the treehouse is halted when the girls also show up, so she tries to scare them away.

episodes.name: Nazboo's Family Reunion
episodes.overview: When Nazboo's siblings come to visit, Zeta recruits them to help take the girls' gems when they're not home.

episodes.name: The Darpoppy
episodes.overview: When Zac wishes himself into the forest to find a mythical creature, Kaz and the girls adventure to find him.

episodes.name: Hounded
episodes.overview: Zac uses a wish to bring his dog Rocket to Zahramay Falls – but the genies mistake him for a monster.

episodes.name: The Sorceress' Apprentice
episodes.overview: After using magic to make Zac forget who he is, Zeta trains him as her apprentice and tries teaching him potions.

episodes.name: All that Glitters
episodes.overview: When Zeta steals the Glitter Genie's staff, the girls must retrieve it before the Glitter Genie's palace disappears

episodes.name: Grab That Gem!
episodes.overview: While in Rainbow Zahramay the girls find a Kaliope Crystal which are crystals used to create Genie Gems.

episodes.name: Dance Magic
episodes.overview: Princess Samira and the girls travel to Rainbow Zahramay so Samira can introduce them to the Dance Magic Instructor, Sarah so they can learn some Dance Magic.

episodes.name: Whatever Floats Your Boat
episodes.overview: A cute little Zenguin takes a wishing coin and lead the girls on a chase around their boat.

episodes.name: Waterbent
episodes.overview: Imma the Waterfall Genie invites the girls to a pool party. However Zeta follows them and steals Imma's Staff in order to use its water magic to make herself the most powerful person in both Rainbow Zahramay and Zahramay Falls, forcing Imma and the girls to work together to get it back and stop Zeta.

episodes.name: Snow Time to Spare
episodes.overview: The girls visit Layla at her Ice Palace and help her prepare for a festival.

episodes.name: Pet Games
episodes.overview: The girls and Kaz invite Nazboo and his siblings to compete with their pets in the pet games. Zeta accompanies the siblings and though uninterested in the games at first she changes her mind when it is revealed that the prize is a box containing a mystery prize, which Zeta believes will make her all powerful causing her to want the Nazboo Family to win so she can claim the prize.

episodes.name: Zahramay Dreams
episodes.overview: While sleeping over at Shimmer and Shine's palace, Leah dreams of them riding on shooting stars. After waking up she tells her genies about her dream and she hears about their dreams. However when Leah tries to wish for her dream to come true, it does not work and her genies explain that only the dream genie Nadia can grant such a wish and that she lives in a palace somewhere.

episodes.name: Careful What You Wish For
episodes.overview: Princess Samira invites the girls and Zac to her palace. Samira shows them her library containing magic books and gems

episodes.name: Glitter Glitch!
episodes.overview: The girls visit the Glitter Genie to learn glitter magic, but something causes Shimmer to keep messing up.

episodes.name: Crystal Chaos
episodes.overview: The girls visit Princess Ula, who takes them underwater to help gather crystals in the beautiful coral reef.

episodes.name: A Lightning Colt for Shaya
episodes.overview: The girls travel with Shaya to an island where they meet the Animal Genie who looks after all animals.

episodes.name: A Special Delivery
episodes.overview: Shimmer and Shine tell Leah the story of how they met Tala and Nahal with help from the Animal Genie.

episodes.name: Zahra glitter, Zahra Glow
episodes.overview: The Girls celebrate Cuddle Buddy Day by helping the Animal Genie deliver pets. When Zeta use a spell to make everything dark, Misha teams up with Afina to make the pets glow so they can see.

episodes.name: Nila Out of Water
episodes.overview: While spending time with their friend Nila the mermaid, the girls tell her about what it is like on land in Zahramay Falls and she wishes to see what it is like.

episodes.name: I Dream of Zeta
episodes.overview: Nadia the Dream Genie asks the girls to accompany her apprentice Ezri on his first solo challenge as a Dream Genie to deliver wishes all over Zahramay Falls while Nadia is delivering dreams to Rainbow Zahramay.

episodes.name: A Pirate Genie's Life for Me
episodes.overview: Shimmer and Shine help Zora to locate a magical Rainbow Pearl, which would make her ship the most powerful one in the world. It is up to Shimmer and Shine to find the precious pearl. Zora and the girls must face challenges to procure it.

episodes.name: Wacky Wishes
episodes.overview: Princess Samira has an extraordinary magical wand that can make any wish come true. Excited to seize one for herself, Zeta snatches it and transforms herself into an enormous genie. Princess Samira and the girls must prevent Zeta from hurting other genies.

episodes.name: Welcome to Zahramay Skies
episodes.overview: Shimmer, Shine, and Leah travel to a magical new land called Zahramay Skies and meet Adara, the Stardust Princess.

episodes.name: Pets to the Rescue
episodes.overview: When Zeta traps the girls in a magic bubble, Tala, Nahal, and Parisa team up with the girls' Zahracorns to free them.

episodes.name: Runaway Rainbow
episodes.overview: Shimmer, Shine and Leah meet Rubi, a Rainbow Genie-in-Training, whose rainbows quickly get out of control.

episodes.name: Zeta Sleeps Over
episodes.overview: A stinky bug infestation in Zeta's secret lair forces her to spend the night at Shimmer and Shine's palace.

episodes.name: Genie Babies
episodes.overview: Zeta and Nazboo have to take care of Shimmer, Shine and Leah when a potion mishap turns them into little babies.

episodes.name: Oceans Collide
episodes.overview: When Zeta takes some of Ula's powerful gems, Shimmer, Shine, Leah, Nila and Ula must work together to stop her.

episodes.name: Par-Tea Time
episodes.overview: When the girls go looking for the Zahramay Tea Flower, they run into cute little Fuzzle Whuzzles who complicate their quest.

episodes.name: The Zahra-Star
episodes.overview: Shimmer and Zahrora accidentally cause some trouble when they visit a new part of Zahramay Skies called Zahraconia.

episodes.name: Rainbows to the Rescue
episodes.overview: When flight magic disappears from Zahramay Skies, Rubi and the girls try to set things right, using rainbows to get around.

episodes.name: Daydreams Come True
episodes.overview: When Zeta combines Daydream Dust with Dream Come True Dust, genies' daydreams start coming true and wreaking havoc.

episodes.name: Costume Chaos
episodes.overview: When costumes get magically stuck on Shimmer, Shine and Leah, they must track down a special feather to undo the magic.

episodes.name: Potion School
episodes.overview: Zeta impersonates the girls' potions teacher and tricks them into helping her brew a sneaky potion.

episodes.name: The Painting Gem
episodes.overview: When Zeta gets a painting gem she creates artistic problems that girls need to control.

episodes.name: Longest Day Ever
episodes.overview: When Leah accidentally wants the day to last forever, they need to figure out a way to make the moon rise to the sky by closing the day.

episodes.name: The Zahracorn Salon
episodes.overview: The girls take Adara's Zahracorn to the salon, but must track her down when she gets spooked by all the salon magic.

episodes.name: Zahracorn Tickles
episodes.overview: The girls partake in a Zahracorn Race.

episodes.name: The Sky Garden
episodes.overview: When Adara's flowers will not bloom, the girls and their friend Minu travel to a Sky Garden to find a Zummingbird who can help.

episodes.name: The Dragon Zahracorn
episodes.overview: Shimmer, Shine and Leah travel to the Dragon Forest to help Shaun track down an elusive, magical creature.

episodes.name: Buddies in a Bottle
episodes.overview: Zeta and Zac become trapped inside a magical bottle and need to find a way out before all their friends are sucked into it as well.

episodes.name: The Gem Hunt
episodes.overview: Zeta tries to stop the children from finding her secret cave when she sees them hunting for gems nearby.

episodes.name: Zahracorns on Parade
episodes.overview: Zeta uses a Zahracorn suit to sneak herself, Nazboo, and his family into the Zahracorn Parade, but the disguise goes haywire.

episodes.name: Nazboo's Magic Robe
episodes.overview: Zeta grows jealous when Nazboo gets an enchanted robe that allows him to do magic.
